verses.verse: Nevertheless<WH3588> the dimness<WH4155> shall not be such as was in her vexation,<WH4164> when<WH6256> at the first<WH7223> he lightly<WH7043> afflicted<WH7043> the land<WH776> of Zebulun<WH2074> and the land<WH776> of Naphtali,<WH5321> and afterward<WH314> did more grievously<WH3513> afflict<WH3513> her by the way<WH1870> of the sea,<WH3220> beyond<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> in Galilee<WH1551> of the nations.<WH1471>

The people<WH5971> that walked<WH1980> in darkness<WH2822> have seen<WH7200> a great<WH1419> light:<WH216> they that dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of the shadow<WH6757> of death,<WH6757> on them has the light<WH216> shined.<WH5050>

You have multiplied<WH7235> the nation,<WH1471> and not increased<WH1431> the joy:<WH8057> they joy<WH8055> before<WH6440> you according to the joy<WH8055> in harvest,<WH7105> and as men rejoice<WH1523> when they divide<WH2505> the spoil.<WH7998>
For you have broken<WH2865> the yoke<WH5923> of his burden,<WH5448> and the staff<WH4294> of his shoulder,<WH7926> the rod<WH7626> of his oppressor,<WH5065> as in the day<WH3117> of Midian.<WH4080>

For every<WH3605> battle<WH5430> of the warrior<WH5431> is with confused<WH7494> noise, and garments<WH8071> rolled<WH1556> in blood;<WH1818> but this shall be with burning<WH8316> and fuel<WH3980> of fire.<WH784>

For to us a child<WH3206> is born,<WH3205> to us a son<WH1121> is given:<WH5414> and the government<WH4951> shall be on his shoulder:<WH7926> and his name<WH8034> shall be called<WH7121> Wonderful,<WH6382> Counselor,<WH3289> The mighty<WH1368> God,<WH410> The everlasting<WH5703> Father,<WH1> The Prince<WH8269> of Peace.<WH7965>

Of the increase<WH4768> of his government<WH4951> and peace<WH7965> there shall be no<WH369> end,<WH7093> on the throne<WH3678> of David,<WH1732> and on his kingdom,<WH4467> to order<WH3559> it, and to establish<WH5582> it with judgment<WH4941> and with justice<WH6666> from now on<WH6258> even for ever.<WH5769> The zeal<WH7068> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> will perform<WH6213> this.<WH2063>
The Lord<WH3068> sent<WH7971> a word<WH1697> into Jacob,<WH3290> and it has lighted<WH5307> on Israel.<WH3478>
And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall know,<WH3045> even Ephraim<WH669> and the inhabitant<WH3427> of Samaria,<WH8111> that say<WH559> in the pride<WH1346> and stoutness<WH1433> of heart,<WH3824>

The bricks<WH3843> are fallen<WH5307> down, but we will build<WH1129> with hewn<WH1496> stones:<WH1496> the sycomores<WH8256> are cut<WH1438> down,<WH1438> but we will change<WH2498> them into cedars.<WH730>
Therefore the LORD<WH3068> shall set<WH7682> up the adversaries<WH6862> of Rezin<WH7526> against<WH5921> him, and join<WH5526> his enemies<WH341> together;

The Syrians<WH758> before,<WH6924> and the Philistines<WH6430> behind;<WH268> and they shall devour<WH398> Israel<WH3478> with open<WH3605> mouth.<WH6310> For all<WH3605> this<WH2063> his anger<WH639> is not turned<WH7725> away, but his hand<WH3027> is stretched<WH5186> out still.<WH5750>
For the people<WH5971> turns<WH7725> not to him that smites<WH5221> them, neither<WH3808> do they seek<WH1875> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>
Therefore the LORD<WH3068> will cut<WH3772> off from Israel<WH3478> head<WH7218> and tail,<WH2180> branch<WH3712> and rush,<WH100> in one<WH259> day.<WH3117>
The ancient<WH2204> and honorable,<WH5375> <WH6440> he is the head;<WH7218> and the prophet<WH5030> that teaches<WH3384> lies,<WH8267> he is the tail.<WH2180>
For the leaders<WH833> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> cause them to err;<WH8582> and they that are led<WH833> of them are destroyed.<WH1104>

Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the LORD<WH136> shall have no<WH3808> joy<WH8055> in their young<WH970> men, neither<WH3808> shall have mercy<WH7355> on their fatherless<WH3490> and widows:<WH490> for every<WH3605> one is an hypocrite<WH2611> and an evildoer,<WH7489> and every<WH3605> mouth<WH6310> speaks<WH1696> folly.<WH5039> For all<WH3605> this<WH2063> his anger<WH639> is not turned<WH7725> away, but his hand<WH3027> is stretched<WH5186> out still.<WH5750>

For wickedness<WH7564> burns<WH1197> as the fire:<WH784> it shall devour<WH398> the briers<WH8068> and thorns,<WH7898> and shall kindle<WH3341> in the thickets<WH5442> of the forest,<WH3293> and they shall mount<WH55> up like the lifting<WH1348> up of smoke.<WH6227>

Through the wrath<WH5678> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is the land<WH776> darkened,<WH6272> and the people<WH5971> shall be as the fuel<WH3980> of the fire:<WH784> no<WH3808> man<WH376> shall spare<WH2550> his brother.<WH251>

And he shall snatch<WH1504> on<WH5921> the right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and be hungry;<WH7456> and he shall eat<WH398> on<WH5921> the left<WH8040> hand,<WH8040> and they shall not be satisfied:<WH7646> they shall eat<WH398> every man<WH376> the flesh<WH1320> of his own arm:<WH2220>

Manasseh,<WH4519> Ephraim;<WH669> and Ephraim,<WH669> Manasseh:<WH4519> and they together<WH3162> shall be against<WH5921> Judah.<WH3063> For all<WH3605> this<WH2063> his anger<WH639> is not turned<WH7725> away, but his hand<WH3027> is stretched<WH5186> out still.<WH5750>
